comments:
I20051214-0010

1. click on the fast view bar icon that looks like a window
2. open Problems view (does probably not matter which view)
   ==> opens as fast view
3. while the view is open, right click on the Problems view icon in the fast 
   view bar
4. select 'Close'
==> IAE (details below)

I get the same IAE with other fast view bar 'Close' scenarios.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-12-14 12:10:33.470
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-12-14 12:10:33.470
!MESSAGE Menu must be a drop down
!STACK 0

This was a menu management issue caused by my maive attempt to re-use the menu contribution for both the menu brought up by the new "+" button and the existing one on the context menu you get by right-clicking on a view icon...


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 120710 ***
Thanks though Daniel, at least I know someone's using it...;-).

traces.message: Menu must be a drop down
